# maximumVisibility

**Instance Property**

The maximum distance, in meters, at which terrain is visible for the day.

## Declaration

```swift
var maximumVisibility: Double
```

## Discussion

The amount of light, and weather conditions like fog, mist, and smog affect visibility.
title: maximumVisibility
